update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which data is collected from the OpenVPN server.

address.title: Address
address.description: The IP address and port where the OpenVPN Management Interface listens for connections.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Connection, read, and write timeout duration in seconds.

per_user_stats.title: User selector
per_user_stats.description: Configuration for monitoring specific users. The logic for inclusion and exclusion is as follows: (include1 OR include2) AND !(exclude1 or exclude2). Patterns follow the syntax of matcher patterns.

includes.title: Include
includes.description: Include users whose usernames match any of the specified inclusion patterns.

excludes.title: Exclude
excludes.description: Exclude users whose usernames match any of the specified exclusion patterns.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
